runs.comm: flighted on middle as Dilshan gets this away to the leg side and sets off for a quick single, with Perera getting to the other end in the nick of time before the throw
full and whipping in again from Malinga, this time honing on off, but he does over step by quite a margin, so the first free hit of the game
slides this one down the leg side, with Perera unable to whip this off his pads
back of a length again as Kusal stands tall to punch this one straight down the ground
Dilshan looks for the flick past fine leg, but can't beat short fine leg
seemed to have all day to ease this one down to mid-on to retain the strike
starts off with a nice loosener that goes across the batsman on the way to the keeper
Dilshan decides to throw the kitchen sink at this one that goes across him to the keeper
offered the width and Dilshan obliges as he flashes hard to find the gap on the off side to register the first boundary of the match
in two minds to play this one as he meant to leave the ball, but was too late as the ball hit the bottom edge to roll behind to third man
swinging in to Kusal as he works this away to the leg side for a single

once again Tanvir offers width and this time Dilshan is unlucky as he cuts this one uppishly to point, with the fielder moving quickly to his right to hold on to the catch. First wicket down and a big one as Dilshan can potentially be a dangerous commodity at the top
full and a bit wide as Perera gets low to drive this through the off, but doesn't time it well
still trying to get his radar on track as he fires this one down the leg side for a wide
once again going down the leg side, and close to the pads, as Chandimal is a bit hard done for this not to be called a wide
again down the leg side and Usman is not so lucky as the umpire signals wide
back of a length on the leg stump as Chandimal glances to midwicket off his pads for a couple
better line this time as he gets this to rise off back a length. Batsman content to defend back to the bowler
strikes him outside the leg stump on a length as Usman appeals for leg before, but the angle was not working in his favour, along with, of course, pitching outside leg
punished for straying on the pads a bit too much this over as Kusal flicks this behind square to the fine leg boundary
lucky not to get punished for bowling in the slot as Kusal blitzes this one straight to mid-off
Kusal looking to push this through the off side but can't get enough on the ball
short of a length on the pads as Kusal is able to race for two
slower delivery outside off as Kusal plays this one straight to point
on the pads again and it's like deja vu as Kusal is able to scamper for two quick runs as this one rolls feebly to midwicket
and Kusal evokes memories of Jayasuriya as he pulls this back of a length delivery in front of square, lofting this over the deep midwicket boundary
gets it on a good spot just outside off as Chandimal helps this along down to long-on
back of a length going across Kusal as he punches this one straight to point
a little full from Bhatti as Kusal times this down to long-on, but can't beat the fielder
length ball on the pads as Kusal pulls this one in front of square down to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off which is punched directly to silly mid-off
back of a length and defended back to the bowler to end the over
Chandimal tentative as he plays this off the back foot towards long-on
tries to help this round the corner, but short fine leg is all over it
pitches this on a length as Chandimal paddle sweeps this over fine leg for a boundary
flighted on middle as Chandimal plays outside the line, with the ball turning sharply down the leg side
tosses this up again and Chandimal is making his feelings known as he dances down to heave this over long-on
waits on the back foot before caressing this down to midwicket
plays all around this one that turns in to Kusal as Ajmal gets him stranded on the front foot, with Ajmal shouting a loud appeal, which the umpire confirms soon after
tests him with a short one which Chandimal passes with flying colours as he hooks this one, keeping it down, to fine leg
back of a length on the leg side as Sangakkara works this away to the leg side
deceptive pace from Bhatti as Chandimal is able to defend this to the off side
another short one, with this one seemingly holding up after pitching, as Chandimal has all day to pull this down to square leg
Sangakkara content to defend this fuller one back to the bowler
and finishes off the over with a bumper as Sangakkara backs away to allow this through to the keeper
begins with a wide down the leg side, with a small cheer ringing around the ground
pitches outside off as Chandimal drives this straight to silly mid-off
pitching outside off as Chandimal works this away down to long-on
length ball which is eased down to square leg for a single
played to long-off for a single
Sangakkara gets across and gets a bottom edge as he goes for a sweep, aiming to hit this one fine, as this beats short third man to the left of him to go all the way to the boundary
Chandimal able to tuck this one away to the leg side
Sangakkara on the back foot as he punches this one to deep extra-cover, looking to beat the two fielders around it to the boundary
happy to just run this one down to long-on to get off strike
Chandimal eases this one down to long-on to keep the scoreboard ticking over
back of a length outside off as Sangakkara is able to work this down to extra-cover, and some sloppy fielding affords him the chance to return for two
Sangakkara finishes off the over as he punches this one back to Hafeez

traps him in front on the first ball as Chandimal plays inside the line, with the ball rapping the front pad. This one drifted just a bit to lull Chandimal into a false sense of security as he looked to defend
Mathews off the mark straightaway as he plays this to square leg for a single
slightly fuller as Sangakkara works this one to cover, and a slight misfield gives them the option for the second, but Mathews sends him back
Mathews just runs this one wide outside off, but doesn't get enough on it
this one is eased down to long-on for a single
Sangakkara looking to drive on the up through cover, but finds short cover
tosses this one up outside off, which is defended carefully by Mathews
Mathews looking to work this through the leg side, but finds silly mid-on
able to ease this fuller one down to long-on to get off strike
Sangakkara just eases this one down to long-off
Mathews able to nurdle a single through the leg side
full from Hafeez as Sangakkara hits this one uppishly over his head, with the ball carrying down to long-off
length ball which is dispatched to midwicket. The pair run hard enough in order to complete two, much to the dismay of Afridi
Sangakkara utilises his feet to drive this along the ground down to deep midwicket
worked away just to the right of the bowler for a single
drifting on middle as Sangakkara was looking for a single on the leg side, but Mathews tells him to go back as he comes down halfway. Almost gets Sangakkara run out at the other end
plays this one to extra-cover for a single
flighted delivery on middle as Mathews plays this with a straight bat down to long-on
dances down the track to work this one down to long-on
Mathews waits patiently on the back foot before driving this to long-off
low full toss as Mathews shimmies down to belt this over midwicket for the first six of the innings
follows that up with a clip to square leg to get off strike
worked off the back foot to midwicket for a single
going down the leg side as Mathews plays this with soft hands to the leg side, but doesn't do enough to get past the close-in fielder
Sangakkara backs away to try and loft the spinner over cover. Highly risky shot that as the bounce undoes him
punches this one to the left of Ajmal to get off strike
Mathews goes for the slog-sweep, with deep square leg doing well to get a handle on it

and Sangakkara throws away his wicket to give Ajmal 400 international wickets. Looking to up the ante in these later overs, Sangakkara dances down to loft Ajmal, with the intention of going over extra-cover, but instead hits it directly to short cover, who holds the catch
pitches back of a length but stays low as Thirimanne defends this to the leg side
plays this one with soft hands to retain strike for the next over
plays this one to point, but can't get off the strike
eases this one down to midwicket for a single
full from Afridi as Thirimanne is able to pierce the gap on the off side
Afridi is not impressed at all. Shaking his head in disgust after drifting one on to the pads, hitting the front pad before bat, but the umpire turns it down
once again invites him on the front foot, but Mathews is able to get this away on the leg side for a single
Thirimanne tries to ease this through midwicket, but can't get it away
back of a length and turning in as Mathews is able to punch this to the off side for one
tossed up outside off and turning away from Thirimanne as he fails to cut this away
the bounce surprises Thirimanne as he looks to get this away to the leg side, with the ball catching the outside edge to spoon to the off side instead
Mathews clears his front leg to shellack this one over the midwicket fence Just a straightforward slog that
goes for a similar result again, but mishits this instead to square leg
Thirimanne able to work this away to the off side for a single
back of a length and going down the leg side as Tanvir starts off his spell with a wide
back of a length once more as Thirimanne helps this along to deep square leg, but the fielder takes so long that it affords Thirimanne the extra run
tests him with a short one and Thirimanne swivels on his back foot to pull this behind square on the leg side
slow bouncer this time, outside off, as Thirimanne ramps this through the third man region, but third man is able to intercept it
back of a length on middle as Mathews drives this towards cover
full from Tanvir as Thirimanne leans into a straight drive that just beats the bowler on the right
slower ball round the wicket to Mathews who is able to glide this down to third man
full outside off and Mathews lofts him to deep extra-cover for a couple
too full on the leg stump as Mathews is able to whip this to the deep midwicket boundary, and beats the fielder from long-on to the boundary
short, slower bouncer from Bhatti and Mathews is annihialting him as he pulls this fiercely in front of square to make it consecutive boundaries

back of a length this time outside off as Mathews is in that kind of mood. Goes for another heave, this time over extra-cover, but this goes higher than farther, as Hafeez gets under it, running backwards, but makes a hash of it as it reaches him, with the captain spilling the chance
in the slot and Mathews waits on the back foot before powering this down to the straight boundary, but Umar Amin, stationed at long-on, is able to intercept it before the rope
short and wide and Mathews flat bats this for four to the straight boundary to make this the most expensive over of the innings with 18 runs coming off it
Thirimanne decides to go after him straightaway as this one seems to take forever to come to him, before he hoicks this over the leg side, but drops just short of the fielder at deep midwicket
Mathews shuffles down slightly to drive this on the leg side for one
back of a length and turning away as Thirimanne lasers this to extra-cover
Mathews drives strongly through the off side, with sweeper cover doing well to field the ball
Thirimanne able to work this one down to long-off for a single
Thirimanne finishes things in style as he shimmies down to hammer this offering over the midwicket boundary for a powerful six
Mathews doing the deed as he hits this one through the line down the ground to register a 2nd T20I fifty for Mathews
Mathews looks for a huge six over midwicket, but this one just stays inside for Sharjeel Khan, stationed at deep midwicket, to hold on to the steepler
slower ball which Thirimanne tries to ease with soft hands to the leg side, but instead hits behind to the keeper
another slower one as Thirimanne tries to improvise a paddle, but doesn't hit it sweetly enough, but still gets the single
short and wide and Perera succeeds at hitting this offering straight into the ground. Considering his role in the side, he should have cleared this over the off side
full and on target as Perera bludgeons this straight to deep extra-cover, who dives before the boundary to keep it to just two runs
